title: Lf plat/gold duo partner
body: Any role really, i just need someone to make ranked fun for me and to actually get me to want to play ranked. I am currently plat 3 45 lp and i main mid/support.

replies.body: Why not duo with me? Im on your friendlist main adc support me bro
